articles.description: The former CNET sites are now owned by the people who bring you Wookiepedia
articles.content: The gaming press world has been in quite some turmoil of late. Tencent just gutted Fanbyte, G4TVjust fired a bunch of its staff, and Future Publishing just let go a swathe of writers and editors, des… [+2737 chars]
